text:
@GOPLeader @JosephLazzaro US Public Policy: 
CDC first warning on coronavirus: Jan 8

The NY real estate developer did "almost nothing" to cope with the impending pandemic

He held rallies on: Jan 9, 14, 28, 30, Feb 10, 19, 20, 21 & 28

He played golf on: Jan 18, 19, Feb 1, 15, Mar 7 and 8
